nars.term

Interface TermBuilder

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    TermIndex
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractMapIndex, Cache2KIndex, GuavaIndex, MapIndex, MapIndex2, PatternIndex

    public interface TermBuilder
    Created by me on 1/2/16.

      • apply

        default boolean apply(Term src,
                      @NotNull
                      Subst f,
                      @NotNull
                      java.util.Collection<Term> sub)
        resolve the this term according to subst by appending to sub. return false if this term fails the substitution
